rows.label: tev024101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Caroline about the residential district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Caroline if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Caroline about the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Caroline if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Caroline about damage suffered during the attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Caroline about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Caroline if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Most of the homes in the residential district are being
shared by multiple people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0002
rows.name:
For the most part, people are having to live with folks
they'd never met before we landed here on Mira.
It's a tough situation, but this is no time to complain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I just hope they finish building New LA soon.
Oh, and that the plan includes apartments and such.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I've heard that you BLADEs each have your own room
in the BLADE barracks, and that you can even keep
cats as pets![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0009
rows.name: Gotta say, I'm super jealous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0010
rows.name:
One of my housemates hates pets,
so even though I want a cat, I can't get one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Maaaan, I just want to curl up with a kitty until
everything's better again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Look at how much of the district has ended up in the
shadow of the Ma-non ship. Don't you think that's a
bit much?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0021
rows.name:
We brought these plants all the way here from Earth,
and now I worry they're going to die from a lack of
sunlight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0022
rows.name:
And I doubt having to spend EVERY moment of EVERY
day under a shadow is very good for our psychological
well-being![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Do you think maybe we could counteract that if
we went sunbathing on top of the Ma-non ship?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0027
rows.name:
The houses in this area were made in an old-fashioned,
brick-and-mortar kind of way, so they're pretty tough
to remodel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0028
rows.name:
I really envy how much easier that sort of thing is
down at the BLADE barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0029
rows.name:
You just punch some buttons on a terminal and make
the walls and ceiling any color you want, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0030
rows.name:
...What? You have to be certified as a BLADE before
they let you change your room around?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Huh. That doesn't make a lot of sense to me,
but I guess you just gotta suck it up and do it.
Now go get 'em, champ![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0036
rows.name:
I worried that all the plants would wither and die
while we were evacuating the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0037
rows.name:
But there really wasn't much damage to the residential
district at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0038
rows.name:
That's a relief. You can always rebuild a house,
but when a plant's dead, it's never coming back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0039
rows.name:
And all these plants were brought here from Earth,
so if they get wiped out, they're basically extinct.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Hey, you're [ST:playername ], aren't you?
I can't believe I'm talking to someone so famous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0046
rows.name:
Are you planning to leave the barracks and buy a
home out here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0047
rows.name: If you do, I'd be happy to take care of your yard![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0048
rows.name:
After all, as a BLADE, you wouldn't be home all that
often, right? And it would break my heart to see all
your plants dry out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0052
rows.name:
I like taking care of other people's yards, but I wish I
had a yard of my own I could design the way I like.
Too bad real estate costs so much...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0053
rows.name:
Hmm... Maybe instead of living in New LA, I could
help settle a new town in Sylvalum or Noctilum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0054
rows.name:
It wouldn't need to be some giant thingâ€”just a small
town amidst nature like the ones back on Earth.
Yeah, that would be perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024101_MSG0055
rows.name:
I should go to BLADE HQ and see if they have any
plans to do something like that.[ST:wait ]
